text: Global Electric Motorcars is an American automotive manufacturer. It specializes in neighborhood electric vehicles (NEVs) since 1998 and low-speed vehicles (LSVs) since 2001. By October 2015 the company had sold over 50,000 GEM Battery electric vehicles worldwide. Originally owned by Chrysler, GEM was acquired by Polaris Inc. in 2011. In January 2022, it became a wholly-owned subsidiary of Waev. It was founded in 1992. Category:American automobile companies Category:1992 establishments in the United States
title: Global Electric Motorcars
